{{Exclusive|java}}{{wip}}
This page covers [[block tints]] which were applied to blocks that no longer exist, as well as applications from biomes which also no longer exist.

None of these removed blocks have ever existed {{In|be}}, and all biomes still exist and are listed on [[Block colors]]. Shrubs used the same texture and biome coloring as [[Short Grass|short grass]] and [[ferns]].

== Removed biomes ==

== Removed blocks ==

=== Green shrubs ===
[[Shrub|Green shrub]]s were data values of grass from 3 to 15, which from 13w10a up to their removal used the shrub/dead bush texture, but with an added tint.

{{:Block_colors/Removed_blocks_and_biomes/Green_shrub_colors}}

=== Potted grass blocks, grass and green shrubs ===
Grass blocks, grass and green shrubs would render [[Java Edition removed blocks/Data variants#Blocks in flower pots that should not be in flower pots|if placed inside of a flower pot with commands]] and would use the grass tint of its biome.

Potted grass and green shrubs existed from 13w36a to 14w11b, whereas potted grass blocks existed from 14w06a to 14w11b.

=== Potted leaves and vines ===
Leaves and vines would render [[Java Edition removed blocks/Data variants#Blocks in flower pots that should not be in flower pots|if placed inside of a flower pot with commands]] and would use the foliage tint of its biome.

Potted leaves existed from 14w06a to 14w11b, whereas potted vines existed from 14w06b to 14w11b.
